Docs.summary: Represents a control that defines choices for users to select.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The MenuBase is the base class for controls that define choices for users to select. The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> inherit from MenuBase and allow the user to select an item to invoke some action.
MenuBase is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
